summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of 3rd Avenue Southwest from Olson Place to approximately 1105 feet north thereof; and certain other streets and avenues by constructing watermains and otherwise improving the same, all in accordance with Resolution No. 17075 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment for said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment by Bonds".
